statusLine.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$ErrorActionPreference = 'SilentlyContinue'; $input = $input | ConvertFrom-Json; $model = $input.model.display_name; $style = $input.output_style.name; $cwd = $input.workspace.current_dir; $time = Get-Date -Format 'HH:mm:ss'; $currentDir = Split-Path $cwd -Leaf; try { $null = git rev-parse --git-dir 2>$null; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { $branch = git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>$null; if (-not $branch) { $branch = git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>$null; $branch = \"($branch)\" }; $status = git status --porcelain 2>$null; if ($status) { $gitInfo = \"$branch*\" } else { $gitInfo = \"$branch\" } } else { $gitInfo = 'no git' } } catch { $gitInfo = 'no git' }; Write-Host \"$model | $style | $currentDir | $gitInfo | $time\" -NoNewline"
